member.name: T:TFLOPSCalc.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TFLOPSCalc.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TFLOPSCalc.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:TFLOPSCalc.My.Resources.Resources.kirby
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:TFLOPSCalc.My.Resources.Resources.louise
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: M:TFLOPSCalc.CalcCompute.getRayBoxForUarch(TFLOPSCalc.CalcCompute.uarches)
member.summary: Return RayBox per cycle per unit for uarch
member.remarks: RDNA2, RDNA3 and RDNA4 are known (Xbox Series X Hotchips) Alchemist and Battlemage are known (Intel Architecture talks) Turing is estimated, Ampere, Ada and Blackwell are using whitepapers relative to this estimation

member.name: M:TFLOPSCalc.CalcCompute.getRayTriForUarch(TFLOPSCalc.CalcCompute.uarches)
member.summary: Return RayTri per cycle per unit for uarch
member.remarks: RDNA2, RDNA3 and RDNA4 are known (Xbox Series X Hotchips) Alchemist and Battlemage are known (Intel Architecture talks) Turing is estimated, Ampere, Ada and Blackwell are using whitepapers relative to this estimation

member.name: M:TFLOPSCalc.CalcCompute.getTraverseCyclesForUarch(TFLOPSCalc.CalcCompute.uarches)
member.summary: Return cycles per BVH traversal per unit for uarch. -1 means traversal is handled in softare
member.remarks: Turing is known (Nvidia whitepaper) RDNA2, RDNA3, RDNA4 is known (Xbox Series X Hotchips, AMD slidedecks) Alchemist, Battlemage are unknown but have HW acceleration (noted as 1 cycle for now)
